A

appendAll(File, File, String) - Static method in class pizza.cube.Path
Scans a folder and appends tags to deck file names if the deck contains key cards.
appendFileName(File, Set<String>, String) - Static method in class pizza.cube.Path
Appends a tag to a file name based on key cards.

C

Core - Class in pizza.cube
This class contains the core methods used by every other class.
Core() - Constructor for class pizza.cube.Core
 

E

encodeAll(File) - Static method in class pizza.cube.Scan
Scans a directory and converts all files to UTF-8 and adds in the missing apostrophe from the ANSI encoded files.

F

fileToSet(File) - Static method in class pizza.cube.Core
Converts any deck file to a string with cards separated by a new line
findTagsAll(File, String) - Static method in class pizza.cube.Scan
Scans through directories for tags in the file names and writes the results to the file "Results\\Found Tags.txt".
findUnlabelAll(File, File) - Static method in class pizza.cube.Scan
Scans directories to see if deck files are unlabeled.
fixExtAll(File, String) - Static method in class pizza.cube.Path
Scans a folder and rewrites file extensions

P

Path - Class in pizza.cube
This path contains static methods to manipulate deck file names based off of an existing string in the file name or cards it finds in the deck file.
Path() - Constructor for class pizza.cube.Path
 
pizza.cube - package pizza.cube
 

R

replaceAll(File, String, String) - Static method in class pizza.cube.Path
Scans a folder and replaces all tags in deck files with new replacement tags.

S

Scan - Class in pizza.cube
This class contains methods to scan deck file names for certain tags or checks whether a deck is tagged properly.
Scan() - Constructor for class pizza.cube.Scan
